channel.title: SQL on Himanshu Shah
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on Himanshu Shah

item.title: Viant Technology - Full Stack Intern
item.description: Responsibilities/Accomplishments As a Full Stack Intern in the Platform team I - Developed a feature for extracting audio from videos using `AWS MediaConvert`, `SNS`, `DynamoDB`, and `EventBridge`, increasing the bid eligibility for clients’ ad campaigns and thereby achieving a lift of `15%` in the generated revenue (projected) Saved `8+` engineer hours (per use) by automating the process of adding new third-party segments using `Angular`, `Golang`, `AWS Lambda`, `APIGateway`, and `S3` Evaluated `go-migrate` as a schema migration tool to replace a monolithic file Contributed to the architecture for the Video-to-Audio Conversion project Leveraged Go Generics to make it easier to add/fetch objects from `DynamoDB` Highlights outside the realm of my role Improved performance of existing Python scripts by `30x` on average using Codon, reducing costs by at least `15x`

item.title: Visible Alpha - SE 1
item.description: Responsibilities/Accomplishments As a Software Engineer in the Data feed and APIs team, I - Migrated the existing monolithic ETL application to a microservice-based implementation, delivering high-volume, real-time data to clients with low latency, using `Django`, `MongoDB`, and `Redis`, driving $2 million in revenue Optimized file dispatch latency by 80% using `RabbitMQ` & `Celery` for asynchronous task execution (60 to 10 seconds) Designed `REST APIs` and added APIs and `AWS S3` as data delivery channels to ease data consumption for clients Augmented error logging by leveraging the latest features of `Sentry` and by implementing a global logger, saving 25% of the team’s time spent on debugging and bug fixes Solved complex performance problems by resolving production issues, gaining exposure to dealing with large-scale software design issues, and avoiding performance bottlenecks Worked on projects through different phases of the software development life cycle including writing unit and automation tests and deploying projects on servers using `Docker` and `Jenkins` Wrote unit tests using the `Pytest` framework and increased unit test code coverage from 11% to 77% Carried out load and performance testing of the APIs using `JMeter` Set up a dev environment using Docker and Jenkins for dev testing Wrote backward compatible queries during MySQL version migration Highlights outside the realm of my role Augmented QA team's automation test suite using `Cucumber` test framework and Behavioral Driven Development (BDD) Set up weekly meetings with the Product team manager to understand the product better and bridge the gap between the product and the dev team I am happy to connect to talk about my work, so reach out to know more!
